case.name: Juri cheats
case.description: When playing with Juri, she'll look at Chun-Li's cards and sometimes even say out loud what they are.

case.name: Juri attacks
case.description: When playing with Juri, after Chun-Li gets topless, Juri will sneak up behind her for a surprise "attack".

case.name: Chun-Li dodges
case.description: Chun-Li will react to Juri's attack by dodging it, but accidentally touching her in inappropiate places causing her to orgasm.

case.name: Cleaning hand
case.description: Chun-Li cleaning her hand after involuntarily touching Juri.

case.name: Posing with Mika
case.description: When playing with Mika, if she is at least in the Naked stage, she'll ask Chun-Li to pose together naked in wrestling fashion.

case.name: Spinning Bird Kick?
case.description: Chun-Li's finishing pose is a move that slightly resembles her Spinning Bird Kick.

case.name: Hair down
case.description: Right after finishing, Chun-Li will remove the ribbons on her hair, letting it loose for the rest of the game.

case.name: Chun-Li's butt
case.description: After Chun-Li gets naked, she shows her butt to the player.

notes.note: This case was hidden due to no longer making sense after changes were made to the targeted character. If you're rewriting this character, feel free to delete it.
